sentences.en: Could you get a handbook of London for me?
sentences.cn: 你能为我买一本伦敦旅游指南 吗 ?

sentences.en: Has the book " A Handbook of English Name Reference " been off the press?
sentences.cn: 《英语姓名知识手册 》 已经出版了 吗 ?

sentences.en: Have you any idea how to use the manufacturer's handbook.
sentences.cn: 你知道怎样使用这本厂家手册吗?

sentences.en: Her mother bought a handbook of English grammar for her last Sunday.
sentences.cn: 上星期天她母亲给她买了一本英语语法手册.

sentences.en: His handbook on mushroom is a classic.
sentences.cn: 他著的蘑菇手册是一部权威作品.

sentences.en: I bought a handbook of English grammar last week.
sentences.cn: 上星期我买了一本英文语法手册.

sentences.en: I got this handbook for nothing.
None of them has got a handbook to tourists.
sentences.cn: 他们谁也没搞到旅游指南.

sentences.en: Secondary uranium minerals are illustrated in a Bureau of Minerial Resources prospector's handbook.
sentences.cn: 次生铀矿物已列入矿物资源局的普查手册中.

sentences.en: She is reading a handbook on gardening.
sentences.cn: 她正在阅读一本园艺手册.

sentences.en: THE APPLIED HANDBOOK OF ENGLISH GRAMMAR will be published in numbers.
sentences.cn: 《实用英语语法手册》将分册出版.

sentences.en: The Association gives a free handbook to all new members.
sentences.cn: 协会给新成员人手一本免费手册。

sentences.en: The handbook is valuable to me.
sentences.cn: 这本手册对我很有价值.

sentences.en: This material has been extracted from "Collins Good Wood Handbook".
sentences.cn: 这些材料摘自《柯林斯优秀木材手册》。

sentences.en: We often turn to this handbook for information on transistors.
sentences.cn: 我们常从这本手册查阅有关晶体管的资料.

trans.tran_en: a short book that gives information or instructions about something
